testcase.name: Login test with invalid details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation practice website................................passed When The user enters the invalid login credentials..........................passed And The user clicks on login button.........................................passed Then The user is presented with validation message..........................passed

testcase.name: Login test with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation practice website................................passed When The user enters the valid login details................................passed And The user clicks on login button.........................................passed Then The user is presented with landing page................................passed

testcase.name: Login test with valid details without using examples
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation practice website................................passed When The user enters the valid "mymail@aol.com" and "hello123"..............passed And The user clicks on login button.........................................passed Then The user is presented with landing page................................passed

testcase.name: Login test with valid details using examples
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation practice website................................passed When The user enters the valid username and password........................passed And The user clicks on login button.........................................passed Then The user is presented with landing page................................passed
